head.title: Miss Brown Wed To Mark Siceloff

hedline.hl1: Miss Brown Wed To Mark Siceloff

block.p: LEAD: Suzanne Brown, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Philip J. Brown Jr. of London, was married yesterday in Basking Ridge, N.J., to Mark Jeffrey Siceloff, a son of Mr. and Mrs. Warren J. Siceloff of Basking Ridge. Msgr. William J. Capik officiated at the Roman Catholic Church of St. James.

LEAD: Suzanne Brown, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Philip J. Brown Jr. of London, was married yesterday in Basking Ridge, N.J., to Mark Jeffrey Siceloff, a son of Mr. and Mrs. Warren J. Siceloff of Basking Ridge. Msgr. William J. Capik officiated at the Roman Catholic Church of St. James.

Suzanne Brown, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Philip J. Brown Jr. of London, was married yesterday in Basking Ridge, N.J., to Mark Jeffrey Siceloff, a son of Mr. and Mrs. Warren J. Siceloff of Basking Ridge. Msgr. William J. Capik officiated at the Roman Catholic Church of St. James.

Mrs. Siceloff, 29 years old, graduated from Trinity College in Washington. She and her husband, 27, a graduate of the Virginia Polytechnic Institute, are senior account representatives at the Marsh & McLennan insurance brokerage in Morristown, N.J.

The bride's father is the executive vice president in the London office of Marsh & McLennan. The bridegroom's mother, Mary Siceloff, is a nurse at Morristown Memorial Hospital. His father is the staff manager of operations at Bell Communications Research in Morristown.
